title: Short-Intensive Mathematics Instructional Design Course Utilizing Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematical concepts and basic proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online course for practicing professionals in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Instructors’ digital competencies play a key role in integrating learning elements.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 7 elements of a mobile technology-based math instructional design framework: content, methodology, activities, assessment, technological resources, mobile resources, and teacher
Learners can concretely design math learning activity plans using smartphone-based tools
Learners can develop and apply assessment strategies for mobile learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
